"Huh" the monolith grunted as he roll to a wall.  He thrust his bald 
through it carving a clean slit from top to bottom.  The With a might 
hand he grabed the wall and bent to cross the room, trapping 
Perceptor inside.  Quickly his flametorch wielded the walls 
together.  There was just enough room for Perceptor in there to 
barly move.  "Welcome to my world"  he said as he began 
thrusting his sword in in and out through the wall, leaving Perceptor 
just enough room to dodge, should he have been in his robot mode.
